long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get wallpapers of your favorite Animes on your homepage !

Users can shuffle the backgrounds by clicking the button on the top left corner of the screen. 

By clicking "Add to Chrome" I accept and agree to install the Anime Home Chrome extension and hereby agree to set the Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy policy and Terms of Use.
The search results will be provided by Microsoft Bing.
